item.title: Emergency Traffic Pack v1.2.12 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 12, 2025

Emergency Traffic Pack v1.2.12 ETS2

Mod adds to traffic emergency vehicles (Mercedes-Benz Vito, Fiat Ducato, Nissan Pathfinder, Skoda Octavia, Mercedes-Benz Sprinter) in 39 countries: Finland, Albania, Estonia, Russia, Slovakia, Austria, Slovenia, France, Germany, Moldova, Spain, Sweden, UK, Ukraine, Switzerland, Greece, Belgium, Bulgaria, Hungary, Iceland, Croatia, Czech Republic, Italy, Latvia, Netherlands, Norway, Denmark, Liechtenstein, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Turkey, Tunisia, Algeria, Morocco, Libya, Egypt.
All standalone.
Works on any maps.
Compatible with other traffic mods.
For game version 1.54.x
Some skins by Solaris36

Version 1.2.12 – update for patch 1.54

Credits: TrafficManiac

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Classic Cars Traffic Pack by TrafficManiac v11.6.8 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 12, 2025

Classic Cars Traffic Pack by TrafficManiac v11.6.8 ETS2

Pack adds in traffic 178 cars from 60th, 70th, 80th years:

AC Cobra
Alfa Romeo 33, 75, 90, 33 Stradale, Giulia Sprint, Alfetta GTV, Montreal, Spider ’86, 1750 GTV
Alpine A110 ’73
Aston Martin DB4 GT Zagato, V8 Vantage ’77, DB5 Vantage, DB2/4 MkII, DBS ’71
Audi 80(B2), 100(C3 Avant, Coupe S), Sport Quattro
Austin-Healey 3000, Sprite
Bentley Turbo R
BMW 2002, 3(E30), 5(E28), 3.0(E9), 6(E24), 507, M1
Citroen GS, BX, SM, DS, AX, Dyane
Dacia 1300
Daihatsu Cuore ’90
Datsun 510, 240Z
De Tomaso Pantera
Dino 246
Ebro F350
Ferrari Daytona, 250 GTO, 288 GTO, Testarossa, 250 GT California Spyder
Fiat 125P, 126P, 131, 132, 500, Regata, Tempra, 850 Coupe, Ritmo, Panda, Croma, X1/9, Ducato ’81
Ford Escort (I,II), Sierra(Mk1, Mk2), Capri Mk1, Fiesta(Mk1, Mk2), Scorpio, Anglia, Cortina, Transit ’65
Honda S800
Isuzu Piazza
Jaguar E-Type, XK150, XJ ’80, Mk2, XK120
Lamborghini Miura, 350 GT
Lancia 037 Stradale, Stratos HF Stradale, Thema ’86, Fulvia Coupe
Land Rover Series IIA, Range Rover ’70
Lotus Cortina, Elan ’72, Espirit ’80, Carlton, Elite
Maserati 3500 GT, Sebring
Mazda RX-7 (’80, ’88)
Mercedes-Benz 300SEL, 190, 300SL, TN, 280SL, W124, S124, W126sec, 407D
MG MGA, MGB GT
Mini Cooper ’65
Nissan Patrol ’87, Primera ’90
Opel Corsa A, Vectra A, Kadett (A, C), Omega A, Manta B
Peugeot 204, 205, 309
Porsche 911 Carrera ’73, 914, 911 ’82
RAF 2203
Renault 4, 5, 9, 11, 12, 18, 19, 21, 4 F4, Espace I, Trafic I, Express
Rover SD1
RUF CTR ’87
Saab 99
Seat 127, 600
Simca 1100
Skoda 100, 105
Subaru Legacy ’89
Suzuki Samurai
Talbot Horizon
Tatra 613
Tofas Murat 124
Toyota Corolla (E80, AE82, AE86), Celica ’70, Celica Supra ’84, 2000GT
Trabant 601
Triumph TR3, TR6
Volkswagen Beetle, Type 2(T1, T2, T3), Golf(1, 2), Karmann-Ghia, Scirocco 1, Passat B3, LT, 1600L
Volvo 242, Amazon, 740, P1800

All standalone.
Works on any maps.
Compatible with AI packs by Jazzycat.
For version 1.54.x
Included two versions: for use only with default traffic and for use with Jazzycats AI pack.
You must have in mod folder two files:
classic_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_base.scs
and
classic_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_def.scs (only with default traffic)
or
classic_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_jaz.scs (with Jazzycats AI pack)

Version 11.6.8 – update for patch 1.54

Credits: TrafficManiac

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

McLaren 570s, P1, 720S, F1, 12C, 675LT, Senna

All standalone.
Works on any maps.
Compatible with AI packs by Jazzycat.
For version 1.54.x
Included two versions: for use only with default traffic and for use with Jazzycats AI pack.
You must have in mod folder two files:
sport_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_base.scs
and
sport_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_def.scs (only with default traffic)
or
sport_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_jaz.scs (with Jazzycats AI pack)
If you want to have many sport cars everywhere use only one file:
sport_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_base.scs

Version 12.7.9 – update for patch 1.54

Credits: TrafficManiac

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. item.title: Map of Alaska Beta v0.8.1 1.54 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 12, 2025

Map of Alaska Beta v0.8.1 1.54 ATS

Travel through 15 cities across the largest US state, with over 1200 miles from north to south.
Iconic Highways:
Dalton Hwy & Elliott Hwy
Sterling Hwy
Parks Hwy

Face the challenges of the Arctic Circle!
Snow, ice, phase 3 storms are just a few obstacles you’ll have to overcome in order to deliver valuable loads of supplies to the most remote places in the world.
Are you ready for the challenges of The Last Frontier?
Also a road connection to Promods Canada is available in the download below. (Do not use if using EMMN NTTF RC)

Requirements:
DLC Washinton
Game Version: 1.54

Credits: -

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
